org.overture.interpreter.runtime

Class RootContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.overture.typechecker.util.LexNameTokenMap<Value>
      • org.overture.interpreter.runtime.Context
        • org.overture.interpreter.runtime.RootContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Map<ILexNameToken,Value>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassContext, ObjectContext, StateContext

    public abstract class RootContext
extends Context
    A Context class, specialized to represent points in a context chain where name resolution does not proceed further down the chain, but rather jumps to the outermost level.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface java.util.Map
